name: 30m FX Bollinger-RSI Mean Reversion
description: Intraday 30-minute mean-reversion strategy for the two most liquid forex pairs. It enters when price deviates 2.5σ from the 20-period Bollinger Band and RSI confirms exhaustion, and exits on reversion to the middle band or opposing RSI signal. Fixed-fractional sizing risks 1.5 % of equity with 0.5 % trailing stop and 1 % target.
